text: @IsabelOakeshott Er... no. Sorry. I’d rather my kids have to miss and redo an entire year of school than they contract coronavirus, the complications linked to it in children, or being it home to me and my elderly relatives. It’s time for teachers to come up with another few weeks homeschooling!
